text:
DAI TRUONG PHAT EDUCATION COMPANY needs to recruit position Software Engineer (Core/ Back-end)
-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
JOB DESCRIPTION
- Discussing/suggesting to Technical Leader/ PM about requirements and application design
- Developing fully functional mobile applications (iOS and Android) by writing clean code
- Planning and suggesting your ideas about the products/application to Leader
- Researching and suggesting new mobile products, applications and frameworks
- Implementing high quality mobile application
- Integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application.
- Testing carefully functions, projects before delivering to customers.
- Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
- Knowledge of UI elements & layout, basic animation technique
- Experience in working with Server Side using RESTful, SOAP
REQUEST
- At least 02 years experiences in Mobile development (iOS or Android)
- Proficiency in React Native (Flutter is a plus)
- Able to handle all mobile development processes from development to deployment
- Good at OOP, pattern designing, writing testable code and easy for maintenance
- Have passion for exploring and learning new technology
- Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on App store or Google Play
- Good problem solving, collaboration, and communication skills
- Proficient in using GIT code versioning
- Proficient in oral English is highly appreciated
-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
To apply, please send your CV to mail tuyendung@dtp-education.com or ib directly for more details.
